hopobject.name: webLightSwitch
hopobject.body: The project webLightSwitch is a simple web application written in JavaScript using node.js. It acts as a controller to turn on and off INSTEON lighting controllers. The software communicates with an INSTEON PowerLinc Modem via a serial interface (including USB serial interfaces) to control the INSTEONN lighting controllers.
hopobject.shortdesc: Web application written in JavaScript/node.js which can run on the BeagleBone and control INSTEON devices via an INSTEON PLM interface.
